headline: Aflac Incorporated Announces 5.2% Increase in the First Quarter 2026 Dividend
summary: Aflac Incorporated (NYSE: AFL) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared the first quarter dividend of $0.61 per share, payable on March 2, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 18, 2026. This represents a 5.2% increase over the previously declared fourth quarter 2025 dividend.

headline: Honoring Veterans at Aflac and Celebrating 250 Years of the U.S. Marine Corps
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / November 11, 2025 / On the 11th hour of the 11th day of the 11th month of 1918, the major hostilities of World War I formally ended. This historic date has been memorialized around the world. Whether recognized ...
